bike.description: Specialized A1 Premium Aluminum, w/ concentric BB, fully butted, tapered headtube, forged BB30 BB shell, forged horizontal dropouts w/ integrated singlespeed chain tensioners, 85mm travel

components.description: Custom RockShox Monarch RT3, air shock, firm slopestyle tune, hydraulic w/ IFP damping, 3-position Floodgate, Dual Flow rebound adj., alloy shaft, 200mmx50mm

RockShox Argyle RCT 26", Solo Air spring, alloy 1-1/8" steer, external rebound, Motion Control low speed compression, tooled Floodgate, 32mm alloy stanchions w/ mag lowers, 20mm Maxle® thru-axle, 100mm travel
Integrated 1-1/8" upper and 1-1/2" lower threadless, Campy style, full cartridge bearings
Specialized P.Series MTB, forged alloy, top load, 40mm, 31.8mm clamp
Specialized P.Series MTB Dirt, 6061 alloy, 750mm wide, 9-degree backsweep, 6-degree upsweep, 31.8mm
Avid Elixir 1, hydraulic disc, G2 CleanSweep 160mm rotor
Avid Elixir 1, hydraulic disc, G2 CleanSweep 160mm rotor
Specialized P.Series nylon platform w/ molded pins and knurling, DU bushing, wave washer for restricted spin
P.Series disc, alloy, Hi Lo flange, 20mm thru-axle, sealed cartridge bearings, 36h
P.Series Dirt Jump disc, alloy, sealed cartridge bearings, solid axle w/ track nut, 36h
